content.rendered:
HIII EVERYBODY! I am SO excited… The arrival of fall and Pumpkin Spice (ba$ic) means the arrival of FOOTBALL!!! I mean, who doesn’t love a good Sunday football party?? Or tailgates? Or school spirit cheering on your college? To balance out all of the chips and guac, wings, beers, (and if you’re still in college.. the plastic handles for tailgate parties, YUCK)

I’ve made the perfect challenge for you! Ready? Here are the rules to play by:

xx Katie
